description:
Childhood memories. They`re beautiful, fleeting, sour and eternal. Even if they`re about ero-books! Who would have thought we`d have an episode about G-men`s childhood?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Koro kara / Abakareta Seikatsu / Kuchibiru no Sore
Depuis l`enfance / Le quotidien révélé / Sur tes lèvres
Starting Young / Life, Exposed / The Lips
小さな頃から / 暴かれた生活 / 唇のソレ
어렸을 때부터 / 파헤쳐진 생활 / 입술의 거기
